title: Hardmode Forges
info: The Adamantite Forge and Titanium Forge are Hardmode crafting stations that incorporate the same functions as a regular Furnace and Hellforge, with the additional bonus of being able to smelt Adamantite, Titanium and Chlorophyte ores into their respective bars. They give off fire particles like the Furnace and Hellforge.
